description: Assesses ability to recall recent and past events.

questions.text: Please tell me what you had for your last meal (e.g., breakfast or lunch). Can you describe it?
Can you name the current Prime Minister of India and one significant recent news event?
Tell me about an important family event from the last year, like a wedding, festival, or a visit from a relative.
Can you tell me what you did yesterday afternoon?
Can you tell me the names of your children or a close sibling?

description: Assesses awareness of time, place, and person.

questions.text: Without looking at a calendar, can you tell me today's full date (day, month, and year)?
What day of the week is it today?
Can you tell me the name of the city or village we are in right now?
Who am I, and what is my relationship to you?
What season are we in right now? And what time of day is it - morning, afternoon, or evening?

description: Evaluates ability to handle everyday problems and make sound decisions.

questions.text: What would you do if you were outside and it suddenly started to rain heavily?
If you found a sealed, stamped envelope on the road, what would be the right thing to do with it?
Tell me about a decision you had to make recently regarding the household or finances. How did you decide?
If a salesperson came to your door offering a product that seemed too good to be true, what would you do?
If you had a minor headache or a cold, what would you do to take care of yourself?

description: Assesses involvement in social and community activities.

questions.text: Have you recently attended any community functions, religious gatherings, or visited the local market? Tell me about it.
Do you keep in touch with friends or neighbors? Who have you spoken to recently?
Are you aware of any major events happening in our village or neighborhood lately?
How do you usually handle financial transactions like paying bills or buying essential goods?
Who is the local leader (Sarpanch/Mayor) of our area?

description: Assesses ability to engage in and maintain home activities and interests.

questions.text: What hobbies or activities have you enjoyed doing at home recently (e.g., reading, gardening, cooking, watching a particular TV show)?
Can you describe the steps for a task you do regularly at home, like making tea or a simple meal?
Has it become more difficult to do certain chores or activities around the house that you used to do easily?
Tell me about your daily routine. What do you typically do from morning to evening?
Can you explain how to use the television remote control to change the channel?

description: Assesses ability to manage personal hygiene and self-care tasks.

questions.text: Do you need any help with daily activities like bathing, dressing, or eating?
Can you describe how you get ready in the morning?
Are you able to manage your own medications as prescribed?
(Caretaker observation) Has there been any noticeable change in the patient's attention to their appearance or personal hygiene?
(Caretaker observation) Does the patient choose clothing that is appropriate for the current weather and occasion?
